bio:
Mark Twain, was an American author and humorist. Twain is noted for his novels Adventures of Huckleberry Finn  (1884), which has been called "the Great American Novel", and The Adventures of Tom Sawyer  (1876). He is extensively quoted. Twain was a friend to presidents, artists, industrialists, and European royalty. ([Source][1].)

[1]:http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mark_Twain
name: Mark Twain
title: (pseud)
